price: 伪信者必堕入火狱的最下层，你绝不能为他们发现任何援助者。
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ فِي ٱلدَّرۡكِ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيرًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: inna al-munāfiqīna fī al-darki al-asfali mina al-nāri walan tajida lahum naṣīran
